default.import: Upload file with items. Previously entered data will be updated.

Process.Light.Import.Positions.InvalidFi.title: Invalid file format. Select the file with the extension ".xlsx".
The file does not match the template. Possible reasons:
Process.Light.Import.Positions.InvalidFi.text:
• The file does not contain the specifications of the items
• The request has been updated and your bid is outdated
• The table columns or customer data have been changed
Process.Light.Import.Positions.InvalidFi.download: Download the quotation template and upload it again.

Process.Light.Import.Positions.FileHasEr.title: Items with errors are not added. Correct the errors and upload again.
Process.Light.Import.Positions.FileHasEr.download: Download a file with error descriptions

forbidden.title: Information is not available right now

actions.patch: Do not submit a bid for the group

currency.invalid: The currency is not included in the list of currencies specified in the rules of the request

vat.invalid: The specified VAT rate is not included in the catalog

availability.invalid: The owner requires the presence of all items
availability.banned: The buyer forbids the submission of new bids for this position. Specify "Not included in quotation"

count.deviation_in_request: Deviation from the quantity in the tender is not allowed
count.deviation_in_position: Deviations from the quantity in the tender are not allowed, or indicate "Out of stock"
count.less_or_equal_zero: If the item is out of stock, specify "Out of stock" or indicate the quantity
count.greater_than_zero: If there is no item, specify quantity = 0
count.not_equal_to_position: Deviation from the quantity in the tender

price.gt_maximum: Indicate a price of less than 99 billion
price.equal_to_zero_count_gte_zero: The price is not specified. If there is no item, specify "Out of stock"
price.start_price_auction: Your unit price in {{currency}} ({{price}} {{currency}}) below the minimum price per unit specified by the Customer ({{startPrice}} {{currency}})
price.start_price_reduction: Your unit price in {{currency}} ({{price}} {{currency}}) exceeds the maximum price per unit specified by the Customer ({{startPrice}} {{currency}})
price.new_price_worse_auction: The price per unit must be be greater than or equal to the previous price.
price.new_price_worse_reduction: The price per unit must less than or equal to the previous price.
price.refer_price_auction: The bid price violates the rule of change in price. Recommended price: {{price}} {{currency}} or more.
price.refer_price_reduction: The bid price violates the rule of change in price. Recommended price: {{price}} {{currency}} or less.
price.refer_price_all: The bid price violates the price change rule. Recommended price: {{max}} {{currency}} and above or {{min}} {{currency}} and below.
price.step_down_is_not_overtaken: The bid price violates the rule of change in price. Recommended price: {{max}} {{currency}} or less or {{min}} {{currency}} or more.
price.step_up_is_not_overtaken: The bid price violates the rule of change in price. Recommended price: {{max}} {{currency}} or less or {{min}} {{currency}} or more.
